findings.title: NatSpec Annotations must be included
findings.description: A smart contract does not include the NatSpec annotations adequately.

findings.title: Commented codes must be wiped out before deployment
findings.description: The StakingReward.sol contract includes quite a few commented codes at the end of the contract which badly affects the readability of the code.

findings.title: State Variables Updated After External Call. Violation of Check_Effects_Interaction
findings.description: External calls should be made at the very end of the function. Event emission as well as any state variable modification must be done before the external call is made.

findings.title: for Loop in withdrawLocked function is extremely costly
findings.description: The for loop in the withdrawLocked function includes state variables like .length of a non-memory array in the condition of the for loops.
